document_title: Lower respiratory tract infection: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_name: viem-duong-ho-hap-duoi.json_0_What is lower respiratory tract infection?
subsection_content:
Lower respiratory tract infections (Lower Respiratory Tract Infections – LRTI) are infectious diseases that affect the lower respiratory tract (below the larynx), of which pneumonia and bronchitis are two. The most common lower respiratory tract disease. The disease is transmitted through droplets containing bacteria and viruses when sick people cough, sneeze or stick to contact surfaces. (2)
Lower respiratory tract infection is an infection in the lower respiratory organs
